turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I would like you to pick up Starbucks for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, which Starbucks do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go to the Starbucks at 71st and Binford. They have the quickest baristas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. What do you want me to pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want my usual, a Carmel Macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want it with soy milk today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, Soy milk, but I also want whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, no problem. What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti please! I need the caffeine today!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, no problem! Should I pick that up right now, or would you like it at a specific time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I won't be into the office until 9 today, so I would like it to be brought to me slightly after 9.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. So I will confirm your order. You want a Carmel Macchiato with Soy and whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's it. Make sure it's a Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do! Talk to you soon!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wait! I forgot to tell you, I also want a bagel with cream cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They usually have several different types. Did you want a particular flavor

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I just want a plain bagel with plain cream cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great, Venti Carmel Macchiato and plain bagel with cream cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, Don't forget the soy, and get yourself something as well. We have a long day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks! See you soon!
